scenario: Visa Inc. (NYSE: V) is facing a securities class action lawsuit filed by the Rosen Law Firm. The lawsuit alleges that Visa made materially false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose that the company was not in compliance with federal antitrust laws and did not have effective internal programs and policies to assess and control compliance with federal antitrust laws. The class period is from November 16, 2023 to September 23, 2024. Investors who purchased Visa securities during this period may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out-of-pocket fees or costs through a contingency fee arrangement. The lead plaintiff deadline is January 21, 2025. The Rosen Law Firm has a track record of success in securities class actions and shareholder derivative litigation, and has recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for investors.
